details:
adjective
- (used of eyes) lacking liveliness
= synonyms: glazed
- of ceramics, having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
= example: of ceramics, having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
= synonyms: vitreous, vitrified
- resembling glass in smoothness and shininess and slickness
= example: resembling glass in smoothness and shininess and slickness
